titleStmt.title: An exhortation to England, to ioine for defense of true religion and their natiue countrie Seene and allowed according to the order appointed.
titleStmt.author: R. D., fl. 1568.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Denham dwelling in Pater noster Row, at the signe of the Star,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An exhortation to Englande.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Pater noster Row, at the signe of the Star
